text: The Matsushita Institute of Government and Management (MIGM) (公益財団法人松下幸之助記念志財団) was founded by Panasonic's founder Kōnosuke Matsushita, in 1979, operated by The Konosuke Matsushita Memorial Foundation. == Overview == During his later years, the esteemed founder of Panasonic, Kōnosuke Matsushita, made a significant investment of 7 billion yen from his personal funds towards the development and training of the next generation of leaders for Japan. == References == ==Other websites== *MATSUSHITA FOUNDATION *Shikoku School of Government and Economics *PHP Institute, Inc. Category:Social sciences Category:20th-century establishments in Japan Category:1970s establishments in Japan
title: The Matsushita Institute of Government and Management
